short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can now scroll while watching videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you watch a video on YouTube and want to see more related videos, if you scroll, you lose sight of the video, this extension adds a scroll bar on the related videos so you can scroll while watching the video.
